short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find out what football your favourite NeoGAF members support and judge them accordingly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click on a GAF Members Username to see what football team they support.

PM me on GAF(snoopeasystreet) if you want to get added but no promises on when I update it.

More teams coming soon!
